org.treetank.io.jclouds

Class JCloudsReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.jclouds.JCloudsReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBackendReader

    public class JCloudsReader
extends Object
implements IBackendReader
    Accessing the Cloud storage for reading in a multithreaded manner.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
